analysis.key_quote: Civil servants should lose their jobs when they are incompetent or abuse their positions. They should not have to worry about being fired because they are unwilling to lie in order to bow to imposed political dogma.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the imposition of political dogma on civil servants, emphasizing the importance of merit and the ability to speak truthfully without fear of retribution. This aligns with opposition to the proposed rule, which could politicize civil service positions.
